message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm very interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it.
I understand that $12000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we discuss $16000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $16000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product.
I'm getting closer to your budget, Bob! How about we compromise at $14500? I think it's a fair price for this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $14500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I'm not willing to go below $14000. How about we meet at $14000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $14000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product.
I'm not willing to go below $14000, Bob. I think this product is worth every penny. How about we meet at $14500?
I understand that you think the product is worth every penny, but I'm at my limit. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product.
